title: Total number of Home Depot stores in Canada by province 2018
summary: This chart shows the Total number Home in the Depot competirion .
\\n From the chart we see that the Quebec Province made the Total stores by some margin , with only 1 .
Ontario and Total made a respectable 88 and 182 stores , with Prince_Edward_Island and British_Columbia not far behind , at 1 and 26 respectively .
gold: There were 182 Home Depot stores across Canada in 2018 . Ontario was home to 88 , the most stores by far . Alberta and British Columbia were ranked in second and third places , with 27 and 26 stores located in each province respectively .
